item.title: Google’s new AI feature lets you virtually try on clothes
item.description: The feature is launching in the United States today, letting users try on apparel items in Google's Shopping Graph across Search, Google Shopping and ...

item.title: Snapchat will now let your friends know you’ve made it home safe
item.description: Snap Map's new "Home Safe" feature sends one-time alerts to friends, so you don't need to remember to message others that you're back safely.

item.title: SoftBank-backed LegalOn lands $50M to streamline legal workflows with AI
item.description: LegalOn, which provides AI-powered contract review software for legal teams, has raised $50 million in a Series C round.

item.title: Mission Barns is betting that animal-free pork fat will make artificial meat delicious
item.description: It’s the first such product to reach the market, and it could unlock a host of fattened-up meat alternatives.

item.title: A new AI coding challenge just published its first results — and they aren’t pretty
item.description: A new AI coding challenge has revealed its first winner — and set a new bar for AI-powered software engineers.
